about_the_game:
Unlock more of the most rocks of rocks... in this Rock Pack!
Known as the more special rocks in Rock Life: The Rock Simulator.
You can use these special rocks in both the Multiplayer mode, "Rock Together", and in the Singleplayer mode, "Become Rock".
detailed_description:
Unlock more of the most rocks of rocks... in this Rock Pack!
Known as the more special rocks in Rock Life: The Rock Simulator.
You can use these special rocks in both the Multiplayer mode, "Rock Together", and in the Singleplayer mode, "Become Rock".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220/Athlon II X4 638 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB, AMD Radeon RX 560 2GB equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB, AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: Unlock new playable rocks, in this first ever Rock Pack!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Latin America*, Romanian*
*languages with full audio support
